casebody.data:
The PEOPLE etc., Respondent,
v.
Manuel RODRIGUEZ, Appellant. 2018-455 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided June 7, 2018

Motion for assignment of counsel granted and Christina A. Swarns, Office of the Appellate Defender, 11 Park Place, Suite **2721601, New York, NY 10007 assigned as counsel to the appellant on the appeal herein.
